about_the_game:
This game is a tribute to the creator's late Axolotl pet.

Game Features

  • Inspired by the actual behavior of axolotl, players will engage in underwater combat through jumping and sinking, looking for opportunities to lay down on platforms to regain health.

  • Experience a unique action style as the adventure unfolds, participating in rituals to acquire various distinctive and interconnected faith spells, along with Shaman items to help players overcome challenges, explore, and restore the ruined marine areas to their original natural state.

Game style

  • In Axolotl Shaman, there are geometric totem designs that blend features of Eurasian architecture, grainy material rendering and detailed backgrounds shaped in a post-apocalyptic style.

  • Characters or creatures display a lively and clean, crisp hand-drawn cartoon style.

    The fusion of these elements creates a unique worldview belonging to the Axolotl Shaman,

    immersing players in visual enjoyment.

Axolotl Shaman will also be a spiritual journey in search of the protagonist's inner meaning of existence, revealing the hidden significance behind the game!

short_description: Embark on a buoyant 2D platform action-adventure journey in Axolotl Shaman! Utilize the axolotl aquatic movement abilities and unique spells to engage in battles, Explore as a shaman in a world of geometric totems mixed with wasteland and reconnect with nature! Tribute to the late axolotl pet。
